src.util.representation_util module¶

This module provides a script to extract data from all JSON files stored in a specific directory and create a HTML table for an better overview of the data.


src.util.representation_util.js_stylize()[source]¶
src.util.representation_util.jsons_to_table(dir_jsons, dir_out, name, format='html')[source]¶

Extracts the informations stored in the JSON files and stores creates an HTML-table for them.

Parameters

  • dir_jsons – directory of JSON files

  • dir_out – output directory of the HTML-table

  • name – name of the HTML page

src.util.representation_util.parser()[source]¶

Creates a parser of this script.

Returns

args-parser with the following arguments

Positional:

arg

semantic

dir_jsons

directory of JSON files

dir_out

the directory to safe the HTML page to

file_name

name of the HTML file
